title: Fun Facts About Rioters (as told by other Rioters!)
body:
I'll start..

Shoquistador, one of our lead animators, makes A-MAZING home made Salsa and sells it at work every week. I like it so much that I always reserve 2 jars of it. 

..or if I'm lucky.. 3!

If this is fun, I'm going to ping other Rioters to share something neat they know about a co-worker :D

(hopefully this stays clean!)

replies.body: That is alot of salsa
http://i.imgur.com/gw5yXpO.png
omg it's an Alot, I haven't seen one since high school =O

{{champion:43}} 

SA A LA SALSA.

Hellooooo

Riot Peaches, one of our billing specialists, is a phenomenal speed-runner (gaming). My understanding is that he *just* missed getting a world record in Doom 64 on the "Watch Me Die!" difficulty this past year. He was a part of "Summer Games Done Quick" event, where he not only ran Doom 64 but also commentated on someone else's speed run of Mischief Makers.

The speed-running community seems to be a really cool bunch :)
Hellooooo
Awesome name

Can confirm, Peaches is indeed a member of the speed running community.  

Also can confirm, we are a really cool bunch <3
I didn't know peaches was a rioter! I love watching his doom 64 runs though.
Apprently Riot Peaches is also not too bad at league, I played with him just last week in mid/high Diamond.
ya everytime I play with Riot Peaches he plays Lulu
Yup, he's a Lulu main and almost plays her exclusively. He can play most supports at the same level, but he just really likes what Lulu brings to the table.

Ooh, fun thread!

Riot Gharris (One of our coolest QA dudes)  is actually an amazing dancer. He's made it his life mission to teach all of his friends how to dance as well as him (whether they want to or not).
Riot MilkManiac really does love milk. A lot. {{champion:12}}
Can confirm.

Y U NO red?

{{summoner:14}}
Rioters are actually not red by default. They get to be red if they've done a "forum training" thingy.
If they have Riot in their name, they've done their training. However, this is probably their first time posting on these forums so they haven't been made "red" here yet.

More fun facts! Ohmikegoodness appears in this video of a bowing dear in Nara Japan which has inexplicably gone viral many times over.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S-y6cQwf3_c
Got anymore about Ohmikegoodness?

Oh do I ever...

https://www.youtube.com/user/squashnstretch

Me too!
https://twitter.com/RiotBaconhawk/status/467544808500645888

He's actually our official Elevator Music Providerâ„¢.
Perhaps you should thank it for its politeness by making a deer champion.

I was going to make a list of Rioters and their quirks/tendencies/fun facts, but honestly, i didn't think it was worth detracting from the weight of this one in particular.

RiotNome doesn't have texting.
Fun fact about Scarizard. When we met he said to me "We're going to be friends. That's just the way this is going to go."

WookieeCookie used to work at Disney Interactive, where he was the in-game personality for Tinkerbell in the Pixie Hollow MMO. That's right. Not only does he have the power of Wookiee Smite, he also has the power of Fairy Flight.

Flitterific fairy friends!

ChronopolisCC worked with me at Disney Interactive.  While I was flying around in Pixie Hollow Online, he was keeping a watchful eye in Toontown Online.

Chances are if you were banned for some... not very Disney like activities...it's because he saw you!

On an unrelated note, the house rule for Player Support Pen and Paper games is no bards!  (Because who would want to be one?)  Except for Chronopolis who creates full fledged parody songs based off our misadventures.

Fly with you!

RiotSotere ~~used to be~~ is still a lawyer! And I used to be a nurse!
\ o /
Did you use to make lots of flan as well?

STILL DO!
...at least I would be if it wasn't so fattening = u = calories pls
Nurse checking in! What type of nursing did you do?
I mostly handled the long-term care in geriatrics, with part of my wing split between hospice and post-op :]
What is your role at Riot? And how did you end up going into a game company from geriatrics?

Skins Team QA Analyst, I am one of the Skins Gatekeepers of Quality! My team is involved from the concept stage of a skin to Live release as the voice for the players, making sure things are in good order! o u o

I like to joke that my family is bred to be in the medical field when people ask, so the majority of my relatives are in Healthcare with a handful in Business. After I graduated, got my nursing license and a job, I spent nearly all my spare time gaming while being super involved and active in gaming communities. From there I was noticed by the staff at Surrender@20 site and was taken in to initially help with their side projects :] (Shoutout to *Moobeat*!) From there I volunteered to take on more responsibility to maintain and organize the site, create tournaments and foster a safe community for fans of the site to gather :] Eventually we got a chance to go to PaxEast and there I was noticed by Rioters for my super enthusiasm for LoL :D And the rest is history!

I still love healthcare, but my true passion has and will always be gaming :]
ah cool! I'm a neuro ICU nurse. it always fascinates me how different nursing can be depending on what unit/floor you work on

I hear you there! I find that generally when we say that we are/were a nurse/RN, people usually assume the ones you find at a gen.practitioner's office. 
There are so many types of us, we're like Pokemon! :D
RiotPreeti also used to be a lawyer!
Can confirm :D
What does he do at Riot now?
I do QA for Core Gameplay. :)
Will you ever show up again for TForce Podcast?
Maybe! The timing often conflicts with my working hours. :(
I have a geology degree.. hmmm...
What was your stand in making Malphite?{{champion:54}}
Riot Eglorian is really bad at fighting games, and his beard is actually real.
In his spare time Scruffy likes to torment cats and scorpions.

This couldn't be further from the truth.

I'm not a cat or scorpion.
Feralpony is the best photoshop artist I have ever met. Someday his masterpieces will be selling for millions.
Due to his talents new Sion is going to be amazing.

> Feralpony is the best photoshop artist I have ever met. Someday his masterpieces will be selling for millions.

Can confirm. My favorite is his early rendition of Hecarim. It evoked such emotion.
